item.description: We will start the new season of the Boston Integral Commons meetup reading Roger Walsh's white paper, "The State of the Integral Enterprise: Current Status and Potential Traps."   No matter what path or practices you are engaging in, we have all encountered obstacles to our development - and the Integral community is most certainly not immune to this, if in some ways having more potential traps than many (e.g., egocentric misuse of Integral ideas, developmental complacency, spiritual materialism, meta-pathologies and meta-defenses, and failure to engage the mainstream).   After reading the paper, we will have a group discussion and explore our relationship to these traps and how we can overcome them.
item.name: Potential Traps of Spiritual Development
